name: Zencore AI
description: Zencore AI is an AI-powered trading platform that combines artificial intelligence with decentralized finance to simplify and secure cryptocurrency trading. The platform enables natural language trading commands, real-time market analysis, automated portfolio management, and risk assessment tools. Its goal is to reduce complexity for beginners, save time for professional traders, and eliminate custodial risks through non-custodial execution. By integrating AI-driven insights with DeFi protocols, Zencore AI provides a smarter and safer way to trade digital assets.
